title: MD
biography: Giuseppe Novelli is an Italian geneticist and the president of the University of Rome Tor Vergata.
aiSummary: Giuseppe Novelli is a medical genetics specialist with an H-index of 116 at University of Rome Tor Vergata (Member). Has been published in Science, New England Journal of Medicine, Nature. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
